claim_object.outcome_concept: Black population share (fraction of county population that is Black)
claim_object.treatment_concept: 1927 Mississippi flood intensity (share of county area flooded)
claim_object.estimand_concept: DiD: within-county change in log Black population share caused by flood exposure, at each post-flood decade (dynamic treatment effects)
claim_object.target_population: Southern US counties with >=10% Black pop share and >=15% cotton acreage in 1920 (main cotton-belt sample)

constraints.notes: Controls are large vectors of year-interacted geographic/suitability variables plus lagged outcomes. Blocks are: state-year FE (d_sy), geographic controls (cotton_s, corn_s, ld, dx, dy, rug), outcome lags (lag2-lag4), New Deal controls (lnpcpubwor, lnpcaaa, lnpcrelief, lnpcndloan, lnpcndins).

canonical.notes: Matches the paper's baseline inference: clustering at the county (fips) level.

variants.notes: Coarser clustering at state level as stress test.

sampling.notes: Full enumeration feasible for planned specs.

claim_object.outcome_concept: Farm capital intensity (value of farm equipment per county)
claim_object.treatment_concept: 1927 Mississippi flood intensity (share of county area flooded)
claim_object.estimand_concept: DiD: within-county change in log farm equipment value caused by flood exposure, at each post-flood period (dynamic treatment effects)
claim_object.target_population: Southern US counties with >=10% Black pop share and >=15% cotton acreage in 1920 (main cotton-belt sample)

baseline_specs.label: Table4-Col2-f_int_1940
baseline_specs.notes: Replication coefficient: 0.440, se=0.099, N=2170. Equipment is available 1900-1940, 1970 only.

constraints.notes: Same control block structure as G1 but with 4 lags for equipment (lag1=1925, lag2=1920, lag3=1910, lag4=1900). Treatment vars differ: Table 4 uses f_int for all years including agriculture census years (1925, 1935, 1945, 1954, 1964).

canonical.notes: Matches the paper's baseline inference: clustering at the county (fips) level.

variants.notes: Coarser clustering at state level as stress test.

sampling.notes: Full enumeration feasible for planned specs.
